title: F/S - 1913 T200 Fatima Team Card - Pittsburgh - REDUCED

posts.post_title: F/S - 1913 T200 Fatima Team Card - Pittsburgh - REDUCED
posts.post_content:
For sale is this 1913 T200 Fatima Team Card - Pittsburgh (includes Wagner / Carey / Clarke).  Card is in nice condition with creasing as shown.  Great picture on this example.  Price is $1,250 which includes shipping.  Mailed payment (check / money order) preferred but will also accept PayPal F&F.  Please reply to [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=142&pictureid=30185[/IMG]
